page.title: 18FARMING-A MIXED FARM
page.content: The farm is 28 years old and the family have lived there for that time. The size of the farm is more than{400} {acres}and is a battery chicken farm. They also grow flowers and grain. They grow daffodils, irises, wheat, barley and spring cabbage. The eggs, flowers and cabbages are sold, and the barley and wheat are kept for feeding the chickens. This provides only a quarter of the grain that is needed and the other three-quarters has to be bought. The farm buildings are poultry houses, packing sheds and grain stores. The farm equipment consists of tractors, combines and ploughs. Local people are employed on a temporary basis for picking and bunching the flowers.{Up {to 100 people can be employed at {Easter time.}There is also the egg- packing station which provides local people with permanent employment.
